mapper.select: select "name","total" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_INF_TOTAL" where "sync_date" = ( select max ("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_INF_TOTAL" ) order by "total" desc
select "name","total" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_DAILY_INCREASE" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_DAILY_INCREASE" ) order by "total" desc

select a.name,sum(a.jrzl) jrzl,sum(a.rzl) rzl from ( select "name" as name,"total" as jrzl ,0 as rzl from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_ACCESS_TOTAL" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_ACCESS_TOTAL" ) union all select "name" as name,0 as jrzl,"total" as rzl from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_DAILY_INCREASE" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_DAILY_INCREASE" ) )a group by a.name
select "name","total" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_MENU_TOTAL" where "sync_date" = ( select max ("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_MENU_TOTAL" ) order by "total" desc
select SBPT,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_W"."SP" group by SBPT

select a.name,sum(a.insert_num) insert_num,sum(a.update_num) update_num,sum(a.num) num from ( select "name" as name,"insert_num" as insert_num,"update_num" as update_num, 0 as num from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_TABLENUM" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_TABLENUM" ) union select SBPT as name,0 as insert_num,0 as update_num,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_W"."SP" group by SBPT ) a group by a.name
select "Query_data_volume","Volume_unquestioned" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_QUESTION_PROPORTION" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_QUESTION_PROPORTION" )
select "GXL","RKL","YWL","name" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_SJL_TOTAL" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_SJL_TOTAL" )
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_SS" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_QB" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "Query_data_volume","Volume_unquestioned" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_QUESTION_PROPORTION" where "sync_date" = ( select max("sync_date") from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_QUESTION_PROPORTION" )
